item.title: BDRSuite
item.description: BDRSuite is a robust and comprehensive backup solution that addresses various backup, recovery, replication, and DR needs of your diversified IT infrastructure such as Virtual, Physical, Cloud workloads & SaaS Applications, and supports advanced use cases, thereby ensuring business continuity at affordable pricing. Have a glimpse of the BDRSuite of Products categorized based on different IT environments. For Virtual Environments (VMware & Hyper-V) BDRSuite for VMware Agentless & application-aware backup & replication for VMware VMs with instant recovery at VM, file, and application level.
